item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "I have tried in my way to be free." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "I cannot understand why my arm is not a lilac tree." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "It was only when I got to college that I realized that the rest of the world didn't run the way my world was run, and that there was a need for feminism. I'd thought it was all solved. There are people like my mom, clearly everyone is equal and it's all fine. Then I get into the world and I hear the things people are saying. Then I get to Hollywood and hear the very casual, almost insidious misogyny that just runs through so much of the fiction. It was just staggering to me." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Lev Grossman
item.description: "For just one second, look at your life and see how perfect it is. Stop looking for the next secret door that is going to lead you to your real life. Stop waiting. This is it: there's nothing else. It's here, and you'd better decide to enjoy it or you're going to be miserable wherever you go, for the rest of your life, forever." -- Lev Grossman

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "The creatures outside looked from pig to man, and from man to pig, and from pig to man again; but already it was impossible to say which was which." -- George Orwell
